directions: Whisk together the rice vinegar, red wine vinegar, honey, sesame oil, rosemary, basil, marjoram, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl until evenly combined. Whisk in the vegetable oil, then pour into a vinaigrette shaker; refrigerate overnight before using to blend the flavors. Shake to mix before pouring.
title: Byrdhouse Dream Salad Dressing
